[[MTV Italy]] - [[Viacom]] 49% | slogan = | country = {{ITA|Italy}} | language = [[Italian language|Italian]] | broadcast area = [[Italy]] | former names = ''Paramount Comedy'' | web = [http://www.comedycentral.it/ www.comedycentral.it] | sat serv 1 = [[SKY Italia]] | sat chan 1 = Channel 122 (123 1-hour time shifted) }} In [[Italy]], '''Comedy Central''' is a [[TV channel]] broadcasting comedy-related programmes from [[USA]], [[UK]] and [[Italy]], produced by MTV Italy for Viacom Networks Italia. ==Programming== ===Shows=== * ''[[Lo Zoo di 105]]'' (recorded from [[Radio 105 Network]]) * ''Bastardi'' * ''Second Italy'' * ''Neurovisione'' * ''Amici miei'' * ''[[The Daily Show With Jon Stewart]]'' * ''Very Victoria'' * ''[[The Ben Stiller Show]]'' * ''Markette'' (from [[La7]]) * ''Crozza Italia'' (from [[La7]]) * ''[[Queer Eye]]'' * ''[[Viva La Bam]]'' * ''ComicittÃ '' * ''[[The Sarah Silverman Show]]'' * ''Central Station'' ===Cartoons=== * ''[[Drawn Together]]'' * ''[[South Park]]'' * ''[[Odd Job Jack]] * ''[[The Boondocks (TV series)|The Boondocks]]'' * ''[[Beavis & Butthead]] * ''Comedy Illustrated'' (''[[ILL-ustrated]]'') * ''Fuori di Zukka'' (''Free For All'') * ''Interviste mai Viste'' (''[[Creature Comforts]]'') ===Sit-Com=== * ''Porno: Un Affare di Famiglia'' (''[[Family Business (TV series)|Family Business]]'') * ''Le Regole dell'Amore'' (''[[Rules of Engagement (TV series)|Rules of Engagement]]'') * ''Medici Senza Speranza'' (''[[Out of Practice]]'') * ''[[Courting Alex]]'' * ''[[The Comeback (TV series)|The Comeback]]'' * ''[[Frasier]]'' * ''[[Love, Inc. (TV series)|Love, Inc.]] * ''[[So NoTORIous]]'' * ''[[Normal, Ohio]]'' * ''Tutti Amano Raymond'' (''[[Everybody Loves Raymond]]'') * ''[[Almost Perfect]]'' * ''[[Becker (TV series)|Becker]] * ''[[King Of Queens]]'' ===TV Series=== * ''[[Sex & The City]]'' * ''[[Reno 911]]'' * ''[[Related]]'' * ''Ti Presento i Robinson'' (''[[The Robinsons]]'') * ''[[Stella (TV series)|Stella]]'' * ''[[Last Man Standing (Australian TV series)|Last Man Standing]]'' * ''Dentro la TV'' * ''I Commedianti'' (''[[Slings and Arrows]]'') * ''[[Everybody Hates Chris]]'' * ''[[The War at Home (TV series)|The War at Home]]'' * ''[[Everybody Loves Raymond]]'' * ''[[King of Queens]]'' * ''[[Rules of Engagement (TV series)|Rules of Engagement]]'' * ''[[Worst Week]]'' ===Vintage=== * ''Pappa e Ciccia'' (''[[Roseanne (TV series)|Roseanne]]'') * ''[[Cheers]] * ''Casa Keaton'' (''[[Family Ties]]'') * ''[[Get Smart]]'' * ''La Strana Coppia'' (''[[The Odd Couple (TV series)|The Odd Couple]]'') * ''[[M*A*S*H (TV series)|M*A*S*H]]'' * ''[[Mork & Mindy]]'' * ''[[Police Squad]]'' ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.comedycentral.it/ Official Site] {{it icon}} {{MTV Networks Europe}} {{Italian television stations}} [[Category:MTV Networks]] [[Category:Telecom Italia Media]] [[Category:Comedy Central]] [[Category:Television channels in Italy]] [[Category:Italian-language television stations]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2007]] {{italy-tv-station-stub}} [[it:Comedy Central]] [[pl:Comedy Central WÅochy]]
